metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Easy Winners is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Easy Winners has sections analyzed in the following keys: A♭ Major,  and D♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
